lines.gurmukhi: jYsy dIp idpq mhwqmY n jwnY koaU buJq hI AMDkwr Btkq rwiq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Deep Dipat Mahaatamai N Jaanai Kooo , Bujhat Hee Andhakaar Bhatakat Raati Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as the significance of a lit lamp is not appreciated by anyone, but when it is extinguished, one has to wander in the darkness.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy dRum AwNgin AiCq mihmw n jwnY kwtq hI CwNih bYTby kau ibllwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Droum Aangani Achhit Mahimaa N Jaanai , Kaatat Hee Chhaanhi Baitthabay Kau Bilalaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a tree in the courtyard is not appreciated, but when felled or uprooted one longs for its shade.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy rwjnIiq ibKY cYn huie cqurkuMt CqR Fwlw cwl Bey jMqR kMqR jwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Raajaneeti Bikhai Chain Hui Chaturakounta , Chhatr Ddhaalaa Chaal Bhaay Jantr Kantr Jaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as enforcement of law and order of the kingdom ensures peace and prosperity everywhere, but chaos prevails when enforcement is compromised.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurisK swD sMgm jugiq jg AMqrIC Bey pwCy log pCuqwq hY ]351]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gursikh Saadh Sangam Jougati Jaga , Antareechh Bhaay Paachhay Log Pachhoutaat Hai ?351?

Shabad OS B.translation: So is the unique opportunity for the Sikhs of the Guru to meet with the saintly True Guru. Once missed, everyone repents. (351)
